entry.title: 🇮🇳SAP Build: Create Business Apps and Processes Without Code (Ahmedabad, India)
entry.content:
As we have reached the max. count of 30, REGISTRATION IS NOW CLOSED FOR THIS EVENT!

This SAP CodeJam event will give you a hands-on experience with SAP Build for building apps and business processes without code (Low Code/No Code). 

You will get to know the environment by creating:

  • A business app for an online store (SAP Build Apps).
  • A business process for approving purchases (SAP Build Process Automation).
  • We will also demo a business site in which you can embed the app (SAP Build Work Zone).

You will get to know the SAP Build lobby, where you access all your SAP Build artifacts, and get a deeper understanding of the following topics:

  • SAP Build Apps
    • Connecting to an ABAP, S/4HANA  and CAP service
    • Building UIs
    • Binding data
    • Navigation
    • Triggering processes from your app
    • Scanning barcodes and implementing other mobile capabilities
    • Filtering data
  • SAP Build Process Automation: 
    • Creating a process
    • Adding approvals
    • Implementing a rework scenario
    • Creating actions
    • Calling SAP backends (SAP S/4HANA Cloud and CAP services)
    • Updating data
    • Conditions and GoTo flows
    • Custom variables

This is an in-person event only (not virtual) and is planned for 9th August, Friday from 9:00 AM - 4:00 PM hours local time in India (IST). The language of the event and the content will be English.

Prerequisites

  • Bring your own laptop with power adapter and have a supported Web browser such as Google Chrome or Firefox installed on your laptop.
  • Complete these prerequisites BEFORE you come: Set Up Prerequisites for SAP Build CodeJam 

Location and Event Address: 

TCS Main Building, DA IICT Rd, Infocity, Gandhinagar, Gujarat 382421

The number of seats is limited to 30.

The instructors are SAP Developer Advocates @Rekha_DR  @sheenamk 

The event is kindly being hosted by Tata Consultancy Services – thank you! Please note that spaces are limited – we can only accommodate 30 attendees. If you want to attend, register by clicking the Yes button in the Will you be attending? section. The participants who signed up from this page will receive an email from the instructors/host for entry into the office premises to attend the event.

entry.title: 🇨🇭SAP Build CodeJam- Lucerne: Create Business Processes, Apps and Websites without Coding
entry.content:
Join Us for the SAP CodeJam in Lucerne

We are thrilled to announce that a SAP CodeJam event on the topic "SAP Build: Create Business Apps and Processes Without Code" will be taking place in Lucerne - and we definitely want you to be there! This is your chance to dive into hands-on learning and network with like-minded individuals and experts.

Why Should You Attend?

SAP CodeJams are known for their informal atmosphere, where learning is fun and creativity is encouraged. By participating, you'll have the opportunity to:

  • Stay up-to-date with the latest SAP technologies
  • Learn directly from SAP experts who will introduce you to a topic both theoretically and practically
  • Engage actively with coding exercises and receive personalized support
  • Network with industry peers and expand your professional connections

Event Details:

  • Date: Wednesday, October 30, 2024
  • Time: 09:00 AM - 4:00 PM
  • Location: KKL, Europaplatz 1, 6003 Lucerne
  • Language: English
  • Lunch & Coffee Breaks: Included

You can find all the details and the registration link below. There are only 26 spots available, so be sure to register early to secure your place:

SAP CodeJam Lucerne

We look forward to spending a great event with you.

entry.title: 🇮🇳 SAP Build: Create Business Apps, Processes and website without Code(Chennai, India)
entry.content:
REGISTRATION IS NOW CLOSED FOR THIS EVENT - We will send confirmation emails to first 30 registered participants in couple of weeks. A waitlist will be maintained. In case some of the RSVPs are unable to make it to the event, participants from waiting list will be considered for the event. 

This SAP CodeJam event will give you a hands-on experience of SAP Build (Low Code/No Code) solutions on SAP BTP like SAP Build Apps, SAP Build Process Automation and SAP Build Work Zone for building Apps, business processes and business website without coding. 

You will get to know the environment by creating:

  • A business app for an online store (SAP Build Apps).
  • A business process for approving purchases (SAP Build Process Automation).
  • A business website (SAP Build Work Zone).

You will get to know the SAP Build lobby, where you access all your SAP Build artifacts, and get a deeper understanding of the following topics:

 

  • SAP Build Apps
    • Connecting to a backend service
    • Building UIs
    • Binding data
    • Navigation
    • Triggering processes from your app
    • Deploy App to BTP

 

  • SAP Build Process Automation
    • Creating a process
    • Adding approvals
    • Creating actions
    • Calling SAP backends (SAP S/4HANA Cloud and CAP services)
    • Updating data
    • Conditions and GoTo flows
    • Custom variables

 

  • SAP Build Work Zone(Standard Edition)
    • Create site
    • Create page
    • Create space
    • Embed a Build App

Location

Innov8 | Coworking Space in SKCL Techsquare,

Lazer St, South Phase, SIDCO Industrial Estate, Guindy, Chennai, Tamil Nadu 600032

 

  • This is an in-person event only (not virtual)
  • Thank you to Mark9 for hosting SAP CodeJam

Date

Friday, February 7th, 2025, from 9:00 to 16:00 IST

  • A light lunch will be served.

Language of Instruction: English

The instructors are SAP Developer Advocates @Rekha_DR  and @eshrinivasan 

Please note that spaces are limited to 30. 

  • If you would like to attend, Register by clicking the Yes button in the Will you be attending? section.

Prerequisites

  • Bring your own laptop with power adapter and have a supported Web browser such as Google Chrome or Firefox installed on your laptop.
  • Complete these SAP Build prerequisites BEFORE you come: Set Up Prerequisites for SAP Build CodeJam

entry.title: 🇮🇳 Getting started with Generative AI Hub on SAP AI Core (Bangalore, India)
entry.content:
REGISTRATION IS NOW CLOSED FOR THIS EVENT - We will send confirmation emails to first 35 registered participants one week before the event. Please comment below in case you want to be considered in the waitlist. If there are any dropouts, we can consider including those in the waitlist.

This SAP CodeJam event is on the topic of Getting started with Generative AI Hub on SAP AI Core and Python. You do not need to have any background in the topic, but a lot of curiosity!

In this CodeJam you will learn how to use Generative AI Hub on SAP AI Core to implement a retrieval augmented generation (RAG) use case to improve the responses of large language models (LLMs) and reduce hallucinations. You will learn how to deploy an LLM and the orchestration service on SAP AI Core and query it via SAP AI Launchpad and the Python SDK. Furthermore, you will learn about the most important genAI concepts and create and use text chunks and embeddings to improve your RAG response.

This is a free in-person event and is planned on Tuesday, March 11th in Bengaluru, India 🇮🇳 from 10:00 - 16:00 IST. The language of the event and the content will be in English. The instructor is Developer Advocate Nora von Thenen from SAP.

The event is kindly being hosted by TATA Consultancy Services(TCS). Thank you! Please note that spots are limited - we can only accommodate 35 attendees. 

Location : TCS Victor building; ITPL Main Rd, Pattandur Agrahara, Whitefield, Bengaluru, Karnataka 560066

Prerequisites: Any Chromium-based web browser, such as Google Chrome, Microsoft Edge, etc.

Visit the SAP CodeJam group for more information on SAP CodeJam events, to ask questions, and to chat with your fellow attendees.

entry.title: 🇮🇳 SAP Build: Create Apps, Processes and Sites Without Code (Odisha, India)
entry.content:
This SAP Build CodeJam event is about low-code/no-code solutions. It will give you an Overview presentation and hands-on experience with SAP Build for building apps, business processes, and business sites without coding. 

You will get to know the environment by creating:

  • A business app for an online store (SAP Build Apps).
  • A business process for approving purchases (SAP Build Process Automation).
  • An apps landing page (SAP Build Work Zone, standard edition)
  • We will also demo desktop automations and a full business site (SAP Build Work Zone, advanced edition). 

Prerequisites

  • Bring your own laptop with power adapter and have a supported Web browser such as Google Chrome or Firefox installed on your laptop.
  • It can be helpful to bring a tablet or second laptop, if you have.
  • Complete these prerequisites BEFORE you come: Set Up Prerequisites for SAP Build CodeJam 

Location and Date 

This is an in-person event only (not virtual) and is planned for Friday, June 6th , 2025 from 09:30 AM - 04:00 PM local time in Odisha, India( IST) . The language of the event and the content will be English.
Event Address: Hotel Suraj Palace, Info city Road, Near Info Heights, Chandrasekharpur, Bhubaneswar, Odisha 751024

  • The event is kindly being hosted by OSEN( Odisha SAP Experts Network) – THANK YOU!
  • The instructor is SAP Developer Advocate @Rekha_DR 

Please note that spaces are limited! We can only accommodate 35 attendees. If you want to attend, register by clicking the Yes button in the Will you be attending? section above to the right. A few weeks before the event, we will ask you to confirm your attendance.

entry.title: Re: 🇮🇳 SAP Build: Create Apps, Processes and Sites Without Code (Odisha, India)
entry.content: Hello, thank you for your interest. This is an in-person event only. If you could let us know your location and country, we will keep you informed if any local event happening at your location and you could take part there.

entry.title: 🇮🇳 SAP Build: Create Apps, Processes and Sites Without Code (Bengaluru, India)
entry.content:
Note: We have reached our maximum registration capacity and  the registration is now closed. For those who could not sign up this time, please wait for the next announcement in this region.

This is the all-new and revised SAP CodeJam event for SAP Build low-code/no-code tooling and will give you a hands-on experience with SAP Build for building apps, business processes, and business sites without coding. 

You will get to know the environment by creating:

  • A business app for an online store (SAP Build Apps).
  • A business process for approving purchases (SAP Build Process Automation).
  • An apps landing page (SAP Build Work Zone, standard edition)

Prerequisites

  • Bring your own laptop with power adapter and have a supported Web browser such as Google Chrome or Firefox installed on your laptop.
  • It can be helpful to bring a tablet or second laptop, if you have.
  • Complete these prerequisites BEFORE you come: Set Up Prerequisites for SAP Build CodeJam 

Location and Date:

This is an in-person event only (not virtual) and is planned for August 1st, Friday, 2025 from 09:00 - 16:00 local time (IST) in Bengaluru, India. The language of the event and the content will be English.

Event Address: Bosch EC3 (360° Business Park), Electronic City Phase I, Doddathoguru, Bengaluru, Karnataka 560100, India

Google maps location: https://maps.app.goo.gl/nFkWrsEptwqE3ExL7

  • The instructors are SAP Developer Advocates  @eshrinivasan and @Rekha_DR 
  • Thank you Robert Bosch for hosting this event.

Please note that spaces are limited! We can only accommodate 45 attendees. If you want to attend, register by clicking the Yes button in the Will you be attending? section above to the right.
